summary: This bill, the Rural Upgrades for Road Access and Local Growth Act of 2025, amends section 173 of title 23 of the United States Code. It mandates the Secretary of Transportation to allocate 30% of rural surface transportation grant program funds to projects in communities with populations between 10,000 and 75,000, designated as "regional hubs." The bill also reduces the review period for certain aspects of the program from 60 days to 3 days.
